title: Is there a way to change my Client to the Chinese client?
body: This would be really helpful. Thanks!

replies.body: Each region has its own supported languages.  We currently don't support languages that aren't already available for those regions.  We also have a [supported language](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language) guide for some more visibility.  Hope that helps!
